ui.title: TFGBV Global Resources
ui.subtitle: Educational resources at international guides tungkol sa online safety at Technology-Facilitated Gender-Based Violence (TFGBV).
ui.local_support_title: Need mo ba ng immediate support sa Philippines?
ui.local_support_desc: Nag-compile kami ng specialized local resources para sa survivors ng online harassment at gender-based violence.

chayn.name: CHAYN’s DIY Online Safety Guide
chayn.description: Isang comprehensive, survivor-led guide para manatiling safe online, covering topics mula sa pag-secure ng accounts hanggang sa pag-deal sa harassment.

australia_esafety.name: Australia’s E-Safety Guide
australia_esafety.description: Isang world-leading resource na tumatalakay sa key topics ng online safety, kasama ang deepfakes, cyberbullying, at image-based abuse.

unfpa.name: UNFPA: TFGBV Considerations
unfpa.description: Isang critical resource na may title na: "Technology-facilitated gender-based violence: Considerations across the life course", na tumatalakay sa impact ng digital harm.

fma.name: Foundation for Media Alternatives (FMA)
fma.description: Isang Philippine-based NGO na naka-focus sa intersection ng technology at human rights. May specific resources sila tungkol sa gender-based violence at dedicated helpline.

cnxus.name: She Leads Curriculum on TFGBV
cnxus.description: Isang specialized educational curriculum na dinisenyo para i-empower ang leaders at advocates na solusyunan ang technology-facilitated gender-based violence.

svri.name: SVRI Global Library
svri.description: Isang malawak na repository ng research at resources na dedicated sa intersection ng technology at gender-based violence.
